name: NO MORE INNOCENCE
description: DON'T BELIEVE EVERYTHING YOU'RE TOLD. there's no Sega employee that goes by the name         . do NOT receive any official game copies or material from this individual composer, Kenichi Tokoi, has mentioned numerous times how he has never worked nor interacted with anybody that fits under this individual's description during the Sonic Adventure 2 Development Please stay on watch, this isn't a real person.
